    Alter Aeon
   </title>
   <meta content=" text rpg, text based rpg, game, games, video games, online games, free, computer games, pc games, mmo, mmog, mmorg, mmorpg, multiplayer, online rpg, rpg, text game, mud, mud game, muds, mudding, visually impaired, blind, blind friendly, role playing game, dungeons and dragons, d&amp;d, ad&amp;d, dnd, dungeon crawler, fantasy, adventure, adventuring, accessible games, games for the blind, games for blind, diku, diku mud" name="keywords"/>

    <div class="inner_frame">
     <div class="text_border_frame">
      <div class="text_frame" id="text_vframe">
       <h1>
        Welcome to Alter Aeon!
       </h1>
       <div class="content">
        Alter Aeon is a fantasy world of adventure and untold possibilities. Do you wish
 to be a mighty warrior, seeking a dragon to slay? A ghastly necromancer, commanding an
 undead army? A powerful sorcerer? A wise healer? The choice is yours!
        <br/>
        <br/>
        As a text-based game, Alter Aeon harnesses the power of your imagination. The world is
 full of exciting places, from the mysterious elemental planes, to creepy haunted tombs
 and the ancient City of Kings.  Join other players and team up to accomplish your goals.
        <br/>
        <br/>
        The game features:
        <br/>
        <ul class="special">
         <li>
          A multiclassing system which lets you customize your character's skills and spells
         </li>
         <li>
          Over 400 unique areas, with more being added all the time
         </li>
         <li>
          A friendly playerbase, willing to help and guide new players
         </li>
         <li>
          Brewing, carving, and enchanting to make custom items
         </li>
         <li>
          Over 600 quests and storylines to experience!
         </li>
        </ul>
        <br/>
        Play as a combination of:
        <br/>
        <ul class="special">
         <li>
          A mage, master of elemental magics and offensive spells.
         </li>
         <li>
          A cleric, master of healing, protection, and curses.
         </li>
         <li>
          A thief, master of shadow and cunning.
         </li>
         <li>
          A warrior, master of weaponry and advanced battle tactics.
         </li>
         <li>
          A necromancer, master of undead and demonic forces.
         </li>
         <li>
          A druid, master of runes and nature.
         </li>
        </ul>
        <br/>
        Both new and advanced players are welcome. New players will find extensive help, both
 in-game and online. Advanced players will feel at home with a variety of special features
 like built-in aliases and equipment sets.
        <br/>
        <br/>
        The game is also blind-friendly for the visually impaired! Our blind-friendly client works
 automatically with most screen readers and includes sounds and music. Please see our
        <a href="http://www.alteraeon.com/blind_support.html">
         Blind and Visually Impaired Player Support
        </a>
        page for help and client downloads.
        <br/>
        <br/>
        You'll never run out of things to do or people to talk to in the world of Alter Aeon.
 Dare you enter?
       </div>
       <h1>
        How Do I Play?
       </h1>
       <div class="content">
        <div class="imagefloatright">
         <a class="image" href="http://www.alteraeon.com/screenshots/alter-aeon-110620-01.png" title="Alter Aeon Client Screenshot">
          <img alt="Alter Aeon Client Screenshot" class="imageinnerborder" src="http://www.alteraeon.com/screenshots/alter-aeon-110620-01-thumb.png"/>
         </a>
         <br/>
         <center class="imagesub">
          Alter Aeon Screenshot
         </center>
        </div>
        To get connected to the game, download and run one of our game launchers:
        <br/>
        <br/>
        <b>
         Windows -
         <a href="http://www.alteraeon.com/AlterAeonLauncher.exe">
          AlterAeonLauncher.exe
         </a>
        </b>
        <br/>
        <br/>
        <b>
         Mac OSX -
         <a href="http://www.alteraeon.com/AlterAeonLauncher-MacOSX.zip">
          Alter Aeon Launcher
         </a>
        </b>
        <br/>
        <br/>
        <b>
         Linux x86 32 bit -
         <a href="http://www.alteraeon.com/AlterAeonLauncherLinux32.bin">
          Alter Aeon Launcher 32-Bit
         </a>
        </b>
        <br/>
        <b>
         Linux x86 64 bit -
         <a href="http://www.alteraeon.com/AlterAeonLauncherLinux64.bin">
          Alter Aeon Launcher 64-Bit
         </a>
        </b>
        <br/>
        <br/>
        (These linux builds were tested on Ubuntu 14.04. You may need to install GTK (the Gnome ToolKit) to run them.)
        <br/>
        <br/>
        <br/>
        If you're new, you may want to take a look at our
        <a href="http://www.alteraeon.com/guides/new-player-guide.html">
         Quickstart Guide for New Players
        </a>
        .
 					The guide shows how to create a new character, learn to control it, and play through
 					some of the beginning quests.  There's also detailed guides for each topic, including:
        <br/>
        <br/>
        <ul>
         <li>
          <a href="http://www.alteraeon.com/guides/connect.html">
           Connect Help
          </a>
         </li>
         <li>
          <a href="http://www.alteraeon.com/guides/charcreate.html">
           Creating and Customizing Your Character
          </a>
         </li>
         <li>
          <a href="http://www.alteraeon.com/guides/commands.html">
           Commonly Used Commands
          </a>
         </li>
         <li>
          <a href="http://www.alteraeon.com/guides/newbie-items.html">
           Interesting Newbie Items
          </a>
         </li>
         <li>
          <a href="http://www.alteraeon.com/quests/index.html">
           New Player Quests
          </a>
         </li>
        </ul>
        <br/>
        We hope to see you soon in the world of Alter Aeon!
       </div>
       <h1>
        What's The Game Address?
       </h1>
       <div class="content">
        While we highly recommend you use our official client, you can also connect with
 					a generic MUD/MUSH client. The game address is:
        <br/>
        <br/>
        <b>
         alteraeon.com - port 3000
        </b>
        <br/>
        <br/>
        Alternatively, you can try one of our
        <a href="http://www.alteraeon.com/guides/connect.html">
         custom Alter Aeon game clients
        </a>
        , or
 					see our
        <a href="http://www.alteraeon.com/articles/mudding_clients.html">
         Alternative MUD Clients
        </a>
        page
 					for even more options.  This alternative client list is kept current and has a lot
 					of options, including some blind and reader-friendly clients.
        <br/>
        <br/>
        If you can't download or are on a public terminal, you might be able to log
 					in using either our
        <a href="http://www.alteraeon.com/play">
         flash-based browser client
        </a>
        , or using
 					an ordinary telnet program.  The telnet login is on alteraeon.com, using either
        <a href="telnet://alteraeon.com">
         telnet port 23
        </a>
        or
        <a href="telnet://alteraeon.com:3002">
         telnet port 3002
        </a>
        .
       </div>
       <h1>
        Vote for Alter Aeon
       </h1>
       <div class="content">
        You can vote for Alter Aeon on Top Mud Sites to raise its popularity and help
 					bring in new players:
        <br/>
        <br/>
        <ul>
         <li>
          <a href="http://www.topmudsites.com/vote-alteraeon.html">
           Vote for Alter Aeon at Top Mud Sites
          </a>
          <br/>
          <br/>
         </li>
        </ul>
        TMS votes are reset once a month, and you can vote twice a day.  Thanks for helping
 					support the game!
        <br/>
        <br/>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
